code: import React from'react';import'./styleswitcher.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function styleswitcher(){const setDarkMode=()=>{localStorage.setItem('theme',"dark");document.querySelector("body").setAttribute('data-theme','dark');};const setLightMode=()=>{localStorage.setItem('theme',"white");document.querySelector("body").setAttribute('data-theme','light');};const toggleTheme=e=>{if(e.target.checked)setDarkMode();else setLightMode();};if(localStorage.getItem("theme")==="dark"){setDarkMode();}else if(localStorage.getItem("theme")==="white"){setLightMode();}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"style-switcher",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"icon",className:"day-night s-icon",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{className:"switch",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"checkbox",onChange:toggleTheme}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"slider round"})]})})});}
